creator: Omnilert, LLC
descriptionHtml:
The Omnilert subscriber app helps you stay aware of critical communications, access safety resources and respond with real-time information for your organization's safety teams when it matters most.

Sign into the app with your personal access code, available from your safety administrator or from your Omnilert subscriber portal.

Omnilert gives you:
- instant notifications of important messages with single tap access to the app
- a panic button to call for help
- a way to send tips and report safety and other problems
- single tap responses to help inform safety teams during an incident
- quick access to your organizations safety resources

For administrators:
This app is available as a powerful additional endpoint with the following features:
- invite subscribers to sign up using emails or by visiting their portal
- increase adoption by automatically targeting unregistered users
- improve adoption and retention by customizing the startup screen and messages with your brand
- show a welcome message on the main screen
- setup a panic button to call your response team or 911
- setup categories of tips and route them independently, to match different priorities and situations
- send messages with up to 5 questions, and receive aggregated and individual responses
- collect all safety and information in a resources page to make them easily accessible to your subscribers
- make changes to the configuration with immediate effect without needing app updates!

Contact Omnilert to add app support to your account.
